item.title: Uccidete Johnny Ringo
item.description: Uccidete Johnny Ringo, internationally released as Kill Johnny Ringo, is a 1966 Italian western film directed by Gianfranco Baldanello. It is the film debut in the spaghetti western genre for Brett Halsey.

item.title: Shango
item.description: Shango is a 1970 Italian Spaghetti Western film written and directed by Edoardo Mulargia and starring Anthony Steffen.

item.title: Io sono il capataz
item.description: Io sono il capataz is a 1950 Italian western-comedy film directed by Giorgio Simonelli.

item.title: La taglia è tua... l'uomo l'ammazzo io
item.description: The Reward's Yours... The Man's Mine is a 1969 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Edoardo Mulargia.
